question: What is the theme of 2018 World Youth Skills Day (WYSD)?
option3: Skills Development to Improve Youth Employment
option4: World Skills for peace and prosperity
explanation: The World Youth Skills Day (WYSD) is observed every year on July 15 to call for increased prospects for youth to gain access to quality training and skills development. The purpose of the day is to spread awareness on the importance of youth developing skill development.
